informationContent.title: GNotifier
informationContent.shortDescription: easily create scheduled notifications about anything you don't want to forget
informationContent.longDescription:
GNotifier gives you the possibility to create/schedule simple notifications easily for your needs 
 features: 
 super based white / black theme 
 clean friendly UI design
 control notifications from app 
 repeat notification daily option 
 auto delete for notifications option 
 favorites page 
 auto search page 
 dark mode 
 possibility to show/hide delete button for notifications 
 possibility to set notification to be fixed on the notifications bar 
 possibility to hide/show notifications when phone is locked 
 on/off notification sound 
 on/off notification vibration \possibility to delete all notification at once
